Segment.name: P1
Segment.comment: To specify the pick-up details including time, date, and equipment

Field.name: PickUpOrDeliveryCode
Field.comment: Specifies the location or type of pickup or delivery

Field.name: PickUpDate
Field.comment: Date the carrier picks up the shipment from the shipper or supplier expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: PickUpTime
Field.comment: Time (HHMM) that the carrier is to pick up the shipment

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: NumberOfShipments
Field.comment: Total number of shipments on this transaction
